mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.work_center_sid, t.work_center_code, t.work_center_name, t.work_center_category, t.company_sid, t.plant_sid, t.department_sid, t.process_sids, t.process_codes, t.director, t.useable_type, t.output, t.deposit_area, t.time_unit, t.unit, t.phone, t.address, t.remark, t.status, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.work_center_type, t.vendor_sid, t.vendor_code, t.department_code, t1.company_name, t2.plant_name, t.data_source_sys, t3.nick_name as creator_account_name, t4.nick_name as updater_account_name, t5.nick_name as confirmer_account_name, t6.staff_name as director_name, t7.name as department_name, t8.short_name as vendor_name from s_man_work_center t left join s_bas_company t1 on t1.company_sid = t.company_sid left join s_bas_plant t2 on t2.plant_sid=t.plant_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t4.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t5 ON t5.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_staff t6 ON t6.staff_code = t.director LEFT JOIN s_con_manufacture_department t7 ON t7.sid = t.department_sid left join s_bas_vendor t8 on t8.vendor_sid=t.vendor_sid
mapper.select: select work_center_sid, work_center_code, work_center_name, handle_status, status, department_code, department_sid from s_man_work_center

SELECT group_concat(t2.process_name SEPARATOR ';') AS process_names , t.work_center_sid FROM s_man_work_center t LEFT JOIN s_man_process t2 ON t.process_sids LIKE CONCAT('%',t2.process_sid,"%") GROUP BY t.work_center_sid
HAVING t.work_center_sid IN (#{workCenterSid})
ORDER BY t.work_center_code DESC, t.create_date DESC
